content.raw:
the errors should be fixed. [180e87c](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/180e87c97955a8c1a2cfdf4872ce65c704a79e69)

the warnings happens because one of the `<animation>`s is the same of as the animation that comes with `<skin>` mesh so in the end we pass two animations with the same name to ign-rendering. So they are expected. I can change that to `ignmsg` or remove the msg if that’s confusing to the user.
content.html:
the errors should be fixed. 180e87c

the warnings happens because one of the <animation>s is the same of as the animation that comes with <skin> mesh so in the end we pass two animations with the same name to ign-rendering. So they are expected. I can change that to ignmsg or remove the msg if that’s confusing to the user.
